song.englishname: I Will Sing of My Redeemer

english.segment1: I will sing of my Redeemer. And His wondrous love to me. On the cruel cross He suffered. From the curse to set me free
english.segment2: Sing, oh sing of my Redeemer. With His blood, He purchased me. On the cross, He sealed my pardon, Paid the debt, and made me free.
english.segment3: I will tell the wondrous story. How my lost estate, to save. In His boundless love and mercy, He, the ransom freely gave.
english.segment4: I will praise my Redeemer, His triumphant power I'll tell, How the victory he given. Over sin, and death, and hell
